name: Palpable Heroic Perception
description:
A twin-stick Metroidvania created for the Ludum Dare 19 game jam. Find all the keys and ship upgrades, and make it to the final tower to defeat the boss. There are save points scattered around the level in the event that you run out of ship armor (which will happen quite frequently).

Please ignore the silly title. I was 16 or something, y'know. Originally there was a hidden php file which would tell you some secrets about the game with the code you entered in it, but I took that down, and you don't really need it to finish the game anyway.

Controls:

  • WASD – Thrust
  • IJKL – Shoot

A JRE that supports Java 6 is required to play. Please install the Java runtime appropriate for your platform.

Java downloads

  • Windows - http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u112-...
  • macOS - http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u112-...
